dataSetup.title: Data Setup
dataSetup.description: Manage foundational master data for device repair operations.

project.title: Project
project.description: Manage project information that groups device repair processes.

model.title: Model
model.description: Manage device model information including specifications and features.

label.title: Label
label.description: Manage labels used throughout the device's repair process and shipping.

accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.description: Manage items related to basic account information.

company.title: Company
company.description: Manage company profile and organizational settings.

jobFields.title: Job Fields
jobFields.description: Manage various job fields and roles in the organization.

shifts.title: Shifts
shifts.description: Manage work shifts and schedules for employees.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage users and their access levels.

workspaces.title: Workspaces
workspaces.description: Manage different workspaces for organizing projects and teams.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Manage access permissions for users and groups.

userPermissions.title: User Permissions
userPermissions.description: Manage the permissions you grant to individuals.

groupPermissions.title: Group Permissions
groupPermissions.description: Manage the permissions you grant to groups.

workflowSettings.title: Workflow Settings
workflowSettings.description: Manage workflow steps and validation rules.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: Manage workflow steps involved in the device repair process.

validations.title: Validations
validations.description: Manage validation rules to ensure data integrity during the workflow.

itServiceDeskSettings.title: IT Service Desk Settings
itServiceDeskSettings.description: Manage categories, approval steps, and assignment rules for IT service desk tickets.

category.title: Category
category.description: Manage categories and sub-categories for IT service desk tickets.

approvalSteps.title: Approval Steps
approvalSteps.description: Manage approval steps required before IT service desk tickets are routed to assignees.

assignmentRules.title: Assignment Rules
assignmentRules.description: Manage assignment rules for IT service desk tickets.
